pages.text: Dachshund are fast dogs best known for their long bodies and short legs. They were, however, originally bred to hunt badgers!$(br2)At less than half a block tall, these speedy little dogs come in six different colors and make great companions.
These little dogs are most commonly found in various taiga biomes. They can also be found in flower forests and meadows, and more rarely in savannas.
pages.title: Location
Taming
pages.text: These dogs can be tamed with a Rabbit Treat.
